status_effects.name: Poison
status_effects.description: Inflicts poison damage at the start of the creature's turn.
status_effects.clear_method: Consume antidote, end of combat

status_effects.name: Stun
status_effects.description: Temporarily incapacitates the target, preventing actions.
status_effects.clear_method: Wait til effect expires, end of combat

status_effects.name: Sleep
status_effects.description: Puts the target into a deep sleep, rendering them unconscious until hit.
status_effects.clear_method: Take damage or be awoken by ally

status_effects.name: Burn
status_effects.description: Inflicts fire damage at the start of the creature's turn.
status_effects.clear_method: Be doused with water, consume aqual essence, end combat

status_effects.name: Freeze
status_effects.description: Slows the target, reducing their MVMT to 1.
status_effects.clear_method: Drink alcohol, end combat

status_effects.name: Hobble
status_effects.description: Cripples the target, reducing their MVMT by half.
status_effects.clear_method: Receive healing from a spell or potion, long rest

status_effects.name: Blind
status_effects.description: Prevents the target from seeing, requires a successful Perception check to land attacks.
status_effects.clear_method: Wipe your eyes with a cloth (if applied physically), experience dispel effect (if applied magically), end of combat/leave area (if cloud).

status_effects.name: Charm
status_effects.description: Makes the target friendly.
status_effects.clear_method: DC15 MND check, end of combat

status_effects.name: Confuse
status_effects.description: Causes the target to act erratically and attack allies.
status_effects.clear_method: DC15 MND check (on fail attack nearest ally), end of combat

status_effects.name: Fear
status_effects.description: Forces the target to flee to avoid the source of fear.
status_effects.clear_method: DC15 MND check, one turn, end of combat

status_effects.name: Silence
status_effects.description: Prevents the target from casting spells.
status_effects.clear_method: Leave silence area (if area), consume Potion of Dispel (if individually applied), DC18 MND check, end of combat

status_effects.name: Bleed
status_effects.description: Inflicts physical damage at the start of the creature's turn.
status_effects.clear_method: Receive healing, end of combat

status_effects.name: Curse
status_effects.description: Increases damage taken from all sources.
status_effects.clear_method: End of combat

status_effects.name: Petrify
status_effects.description: Turns the target to stone.
status_effects.clear_method: Consume Potion of Antipetrification

status_effects.name: Root
status_effects.description: Prevents the target from moving.
status_effects.clear_method: DC15 Brawn/Reflex check, end of combat

status_effects.name: Disarm
status_effects.description: Unequips the target's currently equipped weapon(s).
status_effects.clear_method: Pick up and reequip weapon

status_effects.name: Exhaust
status_effects.description: Causes the target to take an extra point of exhaustion each time they take exhaustion.
status_effects.clear_method: Long rest

status_effects.name: Taunt
status_effects.description: Forces the target to attack a specific character.
status_effects.clear_method: DC15 MND check, end of combat

status_effects.name: Hungry
status_effects.description: Reduces inventory slots by 1 per missed meal.
status_effects.clear_method: Eat a meal

status_effects.name: Weaken
status_effects.description: Target has disadvantage on damage rolls
status_effects.clear_method: DC15 STR check, end of combat

status_effects.name: Prone
status_effects.description: Knocked to the ground. Attacks against you roll with advantage.
status_effects.clear_method: Spend your MVMT to stand up, end of combat.

status_effects.name: Sunder
status_effects.description: Your armor is reduced by a specified amount, either due to physical damage or corrosion.
status_effects.clear_method: Clean or repair the armor (depends on the source of the effect).
